# Recommended Background Images from Unsplash

## Hero Section Background

### Option 1: Blue Network Connections (RECOMMENDED)
- **URL:** https://unsplash.com/photos/xuTJZ7uD7PI
- **Photographer:** Conny Schneider
- **Description:** Blue background with lines and dots - perfect for hero section
- **Download:** Click "Download free" on Unsplash page
- **Suggested filename:** `hero-network-blue.jpg`

### Option 2: Abstract Network Visualization
- **URL:** https://unsplash.com/photos/pREq0ns_p_E
- **Description:** Blue abstract background with lines and dots
- **Suggested filename:** `hero-network-abstract.jpg`

### Option 3: Data Visualization by Alina Grubnyak
- **Profile:** https://unsplash.com/@alinnnaaaa
- **Browse her collection** for colorful network visualizations
- **Recommended:** Look for images with blue/teal color schemes to match brand

## Additional Section Backgrounds (Optional)

### Subtle Textures
- **Search:** https://unsplash.com/s/photos/abstract-gradient-blue
- Use for section backgrounds at low opacity (10-20%)

### Laboratory/Research (If using human elements)
- **Search:** https://unsplash.com/s/photos/laboratory-research
- **Search:** https://unsplash.com/s/photos/scientist-microscope

## How to Download:

1. Visit the Unsplash URL
2. Click "Download free" button (no attribution required for commercial use)
3. Save to `assets/images/backgrounds/` with appropriate filename
4. Optimize for web:
   - Resize to max 1920px width
   - Use quality 80-85 for JPG
   - Or use online tool: https://tinypng.com or https://squoosh.app
